info.title: NOVELCovid/API
info.description: Covid19 Third Party API for Global Information

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

get.summary: Get Global Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Get global stats: cases, deaths, recovered, time last updated, and active cases. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: For this parameter you can provide a key from the country model (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, active, etc) to sort the states from greatest to least, depending on the key.

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

get.summary: Get US State Totals
get.description: Get stats on United States of America States with COVID-19, including cases, new cases, deaths, new deaths, and active cases. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: state name or comma separated names spelled correctly

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

get.summary: Get US State Totals for a specific state
get.description: Get cases, new cases, deaths, new deaths, and active cases for a state. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: For this parameter you can provide a key from the country model (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, recovered, active, etc) to sort the countries from greatest to least, depending on the key

get.summary: Get All Continents Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Returns a JSON array with an element for each continent that has stats available.

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterdays data

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Defaults to true. Setting to false gives you the ability to fuzzy search countries. Example Oman vs. rOMANia

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The continent name

get.summary: Get a Specific Continents Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Get the same data from the /v2/continents endpoint, but filter down to a specific continent.

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: For this parameter you can provide a key from the country model (e.g. cases, todayCases, deaths, recovered, active, etc) to sort the countries from greatest to least, depending on the key

get.summary: Get All Countries Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Returns a JSON array with an element for each country that has stats available. This includes iso codes, lat/long, a link to the country flag, cases, new cases, deaths, new deaths, recovered, active cases, critical cases, and cases/deaths per one million people. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

parameters.name: strict
parameters.description: Defaults to true. Setting to false gives you the ability to fuzzy search countries. Example Oman vs. rOMANia

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use Country Name && Country Id && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards

get.summary: Get a Specific Country's Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Get the same data from the /countries endpoint, but filter down to a specific country.

parameters.name: yesterday
parameters.description: For this parameter you can show yesterday data

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use multiple Country Names && Country Ids && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards separated by commas

get.summary: Get a Specific Country's Totals for Actual and Yesterday Data
get.description: Get the same data from the /countries endpoint, but filter down to multiple specific countries. Data is updated every 10 minutes

get.summary: Get All JHU CSSE
get.description: Get JHU CSSE Data. This includes confirmed cases, deaths, recovered, and coordinates. Data is updated every 10 minutes

get.summary: Get All US County Data from JHU CSSE
get.description: Get JHU CSSE county specific data. This includes confirmed cases, deaths, recovered, and coordinates. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: countyName
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use the name of any county from the /counties endpoint

get.summary: Get county data for a single county from JHU CSSE
get.description: Get JHU CSSE county specific data. This includes confirmed cases, deaths, recovered, and coordinates. Returns array because there are duplicate names. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data
get.description: Get time series info from the JHU CSSE Data Repository. Every date since 1/22/20 has an entry tracking deaths, cases, and recoveries for each country. Updated each day at 23:59 UTC. Data is updated every 10 minutes

get.summary: Get All Possible USA states to query /historical/usacounties/{state} endpoint with.
get.description: Returns a list of states that are available for querying the /historical/usacounties/{state} endpoint with.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: A valid US state name, validated in the array returned from /v2/historical/usacounties

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data for all Counties in a Specified State
get.description: Get time series info from the JHU CSSE Data Repository. Every date since 1/22/20 has an entry tracking deaths and cases. Updated each day at 23:59 UTC. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use Country Name && Country Id && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data by Country Name
get.description: Get a country's time series using a country iso code, country ID, or of course, country name. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use multiple Country Names && Country Ids && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards separated by commas

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data by multiple Country Names
get.description: Get multiple countrys' time series using multiple country iso codes, country IDs, or of course, country names. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use Country Name && Country Id && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards

parameters.name: province
parameters.description: Province name

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data by Province Name
get.description: Get a province within a country's time series. Example is /v2/historical/chn/tibet. CHN is China's iso3 code. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: For this parameter you can use multiple Country Names && Country Ids && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards separated by commas

parameters.name: provinces
parameters.description: Provinces spelled correctly separated by ',' or '|' delimiters, never both in the same query.

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data by multiple Province Names
get.description: Get multiple provinces' time series using multiple Country Names && Country Ids && ISOs (ISO 2 | ISO 3) 3166 Country Standards. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: lastdays
parameters.description: number of days you want the data to go back to. Default is 30. Use all for full data set. Ex: 15, all, 24

get.summary: Get Historical Data
get.description: Return time series data globally. Data is updated every 10 minutes

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state that you'd like to search for, separated by comma if you want to search for multiple (i.e. 'California, Washington'. Default is full data set

get.summary: Get State Data
get.description: Return all NYT state data or individual state data if specified. Each entry returned represents data for a given day.

parameters.name: county
parameters.description: The county that you'd like to search for, separated by comma if you want to search for multiple (i.e. 'Alameda, Humboldt'). Default is full data set

get.summary: Get County Data
get.description: Return all NYT county data or individual county data if specified. Each entry returned represents data for a given day.

get.summary: Get US Nationwide Data
get.description: Return all NYT US nationwide data. Each entry returned represents data for a given day.
